member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiCompatHttpClientBase.CreateWikiAsync(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiCreateParameters,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: [Preview API] Creates a backing git repository and does the intialization of the wiki for the given project.
member.param: Object containing name of the wiki to be created and the ID of the project in which the wiki is to be created. The provided name will also be used in the name of the backing git repository. If this is empty, the name will be auto generated.
The cancellation token to cancel operation.

member.summary: Path of the wiki page.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.Order
member.summary: Order of the wiki page, relative to other pages in the same hierarchy level.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.IsParentPage
member.summary: True if this page has subpages under its path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.IsNonConformant
member.summary: True if a page is non-conforming, i.e. 1) if the name doesn't match page naming standards. 2) if the page does not have a valid entry in the appropriate order file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.GitItemPath
member.summary: Path of the git item corresponding to the wiki page stored in the backing Git repository.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.SubPages
member.summary: List of subpages of the current page.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.Url
member.summary: REST url for this wiki page.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.RemoteUrl
member.summary: Remote web url to the wiki page.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Wiki.WebApi.WikiPage.Id
member.summary: When present, permanent identifier for the wiki page

member.summary: Defines a wiki repository which encapsulates the git repository backing the wiki.

member.summary: The head commit associated with the git repository backing up the wiki.

member.summary: The git repository that backs up the wiki.
